sentences.en: " I love it. Vanilla. With chocolate fudge, please. "
sentences.cn: “ 我爱冰激凌. 香草. 请加巧克力. ”

sentences.en: But in reality, we fudge a middle ground.
sentences.cn: 但在现实中, 我们以中间立场来应付.

sentences.en: Cancer knits sweaters and makes fudge for the neighborhood.
sentences.cn: 巨蟹座会为邻居织毛衣或者自制巧克力.

sentences.en: Chocolate fudge is one of my favorite candies.
sentences.cn: 巧克力糖果是我最喜欢的糖果之一.

sentences.en: Cornelius Fudge : Now write your name only.
sentences.cn: 现在只是写下你的名字.

sentences.en: Cornelius Fudge: Dolores Umbridge has replaced Albus Dumbledore as Head of Hogwarts.
sentences.cn: 康奈利·福吉: 多洛雷斯·乌姆里奇取代阿不思·邓布利多成为霍格沃茨的校长.

sentences.en: Fudge the figures; cook the books; falsify the data.
sentences.cn: 伪造数字; 伪造帐本; 伪造数据.

sentences.en: Fudge! I forgot to buy Jenny a birthday present.
sentences.cn: 糟了! 我忘了买詹妮的生日礼物.

sentences.en: Give me Ben & Jerry's Chocolate Fudge Brownie any day.
sentences.cn: 本杰里 给我的巧克力软糖布朗尼任何一天.

sentences.en: He tried to fudge the issue by saying that he did not want to specify periods.
sentences.cn: 他说他不想规定时间，试图以此来回避这个问题。

sentences.en: I want you to take Mrs. GIoop up to the Fudge Room, okay?
sentences.cn: 我想让你带格鲁普女士带到软糖车间, 好 吗 ?

sentences.en: I've got a good recipe for fudge.
sentences.cn: 我有一套做奶油软糖的好方法.

sentences.en: If you do not know the answer, just fudge it.
sentences.cn: 如果你不知道答案, 就瞎扯一下.

sentences.en: Linda Rhoades bought the fudge during a bake sale.
sentences.cn: 琳达.罗迪斯在糕饼义卖会中买下软糖.

sentences.en: Oh fudge, she says they can't come.
sentences.cn: 哦,胡说, 她说他们不能来.

sentences.en: We could get hot fudge sundaes.
sentences.cn: 我们可以点热奶油糖浆圣代.

trans.tran_en: a soft creamy brown sweet food
to avoid giving exact details or a clear answer about something
